about_the_game:
The game introduction

Oblivion is a high freedom survival building game.The player is an interstellar pioneer who sets up an entire civilization on an alien planet.
Gameplay:
Players can gather, plant, and build various structures and facilities on the planet to develop their civilization.
Civilization is not a single person, and in the middle of the game, players can use human fertilized eggs to grow humans to make the planet more alive.
Each human that the player breeds has basic attributes, such as health, hunger, mood, etc., and they reproduce themselves.
When the player is in a tight position, intelligent human beings will build themselves and build civilization together with the player.
detailed_description:
The game introduction

Oblivion is a high freedom survival building game.The player is an interstellar pioneer who sets up an entire civilization on an alien planet.
Gameplay:
Players can gather, plant, and build various structures and facilities on the planet to develop their civilization.
Civilization is not a single person, and in the middle of the game, players can use human fertilized eggs to grow humans to make the planet more alive.
Each human that the player breeds has basic attributes, such as health, hunger, mood, etc., and they reproduce themselves.
When the player is in a tight position, intelligent human beings will build themselves and build civilization together with the player.
name: 遗落幻境

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64位
  • Processor: i5 3470
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Additional Notes:
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64位
  • Processor: i5 7500k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Additional Notes:

short_description: Oblivion is a first-person 3D survive-building game with a super-core gameplay experience and rich content that brings endless possibilities!
